net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Class ZipFileListDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.data.filesystem.ZipFileListDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.activation.DataSource, FileSystemEntityDataSource

    public final class ZipFileListDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSystemEntityDataSource
    Data source that represents a list of files as a single zip file.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • ZipFileListDataSource

        public ZipFileListDataSource(java.util.List<FileEntity> files,
                     DirectoryEntity relativeRoot,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     long lastModifiedTime)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        files - the files.
        relativeRoot - the relative root/parent directory. Used to generate paths in the zip file. May be null.
        name - the name.
        lastModifiedTime - the last modified time.

      • isBackedByInputStream

        public boolean isBackedByInputStream()
        Description copied from interface: FileSystemEntityDataSource
        Return true if the data source is backed by an input stream. If this method returns false, FileSystemEntityDataSource.getFile() must return a non-null value.
